title: Autographed Lefty Grove RC to trade for T206
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Autographed Lefty Grove RC to trade for T206
posts.post_content:
Posted By: T206Collector
I would like to trade this autographed (SGC/JSA certified) rookie card of Lefty Grove for T206 cards.  I am looking for PSA/SGC 5/60 or better in condition, but would also consider lesser grades for SLers and rarities.

Email:  SignedT206@gmail.com if interested.

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1219842714.JPG[/IMG] 

Published in 1927 and designated W560 by the ACC, a number of multi-sport images were issued -- 49 of them featuring baseball players -- each measuring 1 3/4" x 2 3/4".  The graphics were either red and/or black in the theme of playing cards and the cards were blank on the reverse.

_  _  _  _  _  _  _ _ 

Visit [url]http://www.t206collector.com[/url] for signed deadball card galleries, articles and more!
